text:
@duckypwns Price yes, and of course games but the system just came out. The 3DS has a year on the Vita, so of course it won't have as many games. I also remember the 3DS having bad sales when it first came out, one of the reasons Nintendo lowered the price. Again, almost everyone shat all over the 3DS when it first came out. The Vita (and every system really) needs a year to prove itself.

...No really, I don't have interest in it, despite defending it.
author: Masz52

text:
@duckypwns Weren't people saying the same things about the 3DS when it came out, and now almost everyone loves it? Give the Vita time dawg!

(For the record, I have no interest in the Playstation Vita, I just hate it when people judge a console as soon as it comes out)
